text_en: The learner uses a blindfold and canÂ´t check what is displayed on the screen.
text_sw: Mwanafunzi anatumia kitambaa kufunika macho ili asione na hawezi kuhakiki kinachoonekana kwenye skrini

text_en: The  learners have become blind late in life.
text_sw: Wanafunzi hawa wamepoteza uoni katika utu uzima

text_en: They must learn to operate computers without a screen or a mouse.
text_sw: Ni lazima wajifunze kutumia kompyuta bila skrini wala mausi

text_en: He must rely on the keyboard and the sound.
text_sw: Ni lazima ategemee kibodi na sauti

text_en: She must create a virtual image of how a computer works.
text_sw: Ni lazima atengeneze taswira kichwani kwake ya namna ambavyo kompyuta inafanya kazi
